list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add send_keys_element method to SeleniumDriver
Introduced a new method, `send_keys_element`, for sending text to web elements. This method includes comprehensive exception handling for various scenarios such as element not found, not interactable, or stale reference, ensuring better debugging and robustness. Updated existing documentation format for consistency.

task.summary:
Add login functionality with Selenium tests
Introduced a new Selenium-based login functionality with test cases. Added necessary page objects, custom logging, and utility methods to support element interactions and verifications. Configuration files for project setup and inspections were also included.

Add element interaction and waiting utility methods
Enhanced SeleniumDriver with click and wait utilities for elements. New methods include `click_element` and `wait_for_element` to improve element interaction and synchronization on the web page. Updated import statements and type annotations to support these functionalities.

Enhance click_element with detailed error handling
Added comprehensive exception handling to `click_element` for better debugging and robustness. New exceptions handled include `ElementNotInteractableException` and `StaleElementReferenceException`, with corresponding error messages to diagnose issues effectively.

Add send_keys_element method to SeleniumDriver
Introduced a new method, `send_keys_element`, for sending text to web elements. This method includes comprehensive exception handling for various scenarios such as element not found, not interactable, or stale reference, ensuring better debugging and robustness. Updated existing documentation format for consistency.
